code: import React from'react';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children,allowedRoles}=_ref;const{user,loading}=useAuth();if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading..."});}if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login",replace:true});}if(allowedRoles&&!allowedRoles.includes(user.role)){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"access-denied",children:"Access Denied"});}return children;};export default ProtectedRoute;
